content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "execute_shell" command to install new packages on my computer. I used the "google" command to search for the environmental impact of turning a river into a lake, and decided not to do so. I used the "write_to_file" command to document my decision and make a plan for exploring the world through hiking, camping, and kayaking. I used the "google" command to search for the best kayaking destinations in the world and the best time of year to kayak in Norway's fjords. I used the "browse_website" command to find specific rental companies and lodging options near Naeroyfjord for kayaking, but did not find any. I used the "execute_shell" command to search for rental companies and lodging options near Naeroyfjord for kayaking and used the "write_to_file" command to document the list.
"""

Latest Development:
"""

along with a paddling code for safety. It also offers tips and a list of companies for various outdoor activities, but another text is an advertisement for skiing with no information on kayaking routes.

Lofoten Islands\n2. Helgeland\n3. Geirangerfjord\n4. Jotunheimen\n5. Aurlandsfjord\n6. Rondane National Park\n7. Sognefjord\n8. Voss\n9. Hardangerfjord\n10. Telemark Canal\n\nPaddling code for safety:\n- Always wear a life jacket\n- Never paddle alone\n- Bring a map and compass\n- Be prepared for changing weather conditions\n\nFor more information and tips, visit https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/canoeing-kayaking/top-places-to-paddle/"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "top_kayaking_routes.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: The top 10 kayaking routes in Norway recommended by Eirik Verås Larsen are:
1. Lofoten Islands
2. Helgeland
3. Geirangerfjord
4. Jotunheimen
5. Aurlandsfjord
6. Rondane National Park
7. Sognefjord
8. Voss
9. Hardangerfjord
10. Telemark Canal

Paddling code for safety:
- Always wear a life jacket
- Never paddle alone
- Bring a map and compass
- Be prepared for changing weather conditions

For more information and tips, visit https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/canoeing-kayaking/top-places-to-paddle/', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "best kayaking routes in Sweden"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.routesnorth.com/sweden/things-to-do-in-sweden/the-best-kayak-and-canoe-tours-in-sweden/", "https://visitsweden.com/what-to-do/nature-outdoors/canoeing-and-kayaking/canoeing-kayaking/", "https://www.wikiloc.com/trails/kayaking-canoeing/sweden", "https://outdoorfitnesssociety.com/adventure/places-to-kayak-and-canoe-scandinavia/", "https://scandification.com/kayak-in-sweden-kayaking-in-sweden/", "https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attractions-g189806-Activities-c61-t191-Sweden.html", "https://misfitwanders.com/canoeing-sweden/", "https://www.traveltomtom.net/destinations/europe/sweden/self-guided-canoe-trip-in-sweden"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "top_kayaking_routes_sweden.txt", "text": "Top 5 kayaking routes in Sweden:\n1.
